errors.error_description: A 'Quick Start' section is placed before the 'Installation' section, suggesting the user can run the command before installing the package.
correction_candidates: Move the 'Quick Start' section to be after the 'Installation' section.
Combine the 'Quick Start' section with the 'Examples' section.
Add a note in 'Quick Start' that installation is required first.
errors.golden_answer: Move the 'Quick Start' section to be after the 'Installation' section.
